branchCategory.name: Soft Start Up Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>Soft start valves enable a gradual initial pressurizatin of a system and quick exhaust by blocking the supply of air.</p>

branchItem.name: AV2000/3000/4000/5000 Series, Soft Start-up Valve
branchItem.description: <p>Series AV soft start-up valves allow the user to set the initial rate of system pressurization to minimize system shock.  When deactivated, the valve quickly exhausts the system for safe servicing of equipment.</p>

branchItem.name: AV2000/3000/4000/5000-A Soft Start Valve
branchItem.description: <p>Series AV-A soft start-up valves allow the user to set the initial rate of system pressurizations to minimize system shock.  When deactivated, the valve quickly exhausts the system for safe servicing of equipment.</p>

branchItem.name: AVL2000/3000/4000/5000 Series, Soft Start-up Valve w/ Lock Out
branchItem.description: <p>Series AVL adds lock-out capability to the basic AV series design to permit safe servicing of the equipment once the pneumatic supply has been shut off.  The red button on a safety yellow body aids in identifying the valve as a pneumatic disconnect.  It is available with multiple operating voltage choices as a manually operated valve with no power requirements.</p>
